revision.text: A '''species''' in [[ZDoom]] is a mechanism by which [[monster]]s can be grouped together, mostly for the purpose of [[infight]]ing. Normally, monsters belong to the same species when, [[using inheritance]], one is derived from the other, directly or indirectly. This can be changed by explicitly using the {{Property|Species}} property in the [[actor]] definitions, or through [[ACS]] with the [[ACS actor properties|APROP_Species]] property. [[Category:Glossary]]
